relation.text: Yesterday , A Maria & the Bean drank tea here , nothing particular paſs 'd , but he was attentive & was very lively , we play
see of a certain person the more I like him . Saturday
seven years old the other eight ; he has not mention
Yesterday morning we had a pleasant trio to breakfast , I order 'd
seem much pleas 'd & even interested in my happineſs . On Saturday morning
settled it . We had a very agreeable day yesterday
staid till half past eleven . Tuesday
